text: The 2008–09 Oregon State Beavers men's basketball team represented Oregon State University in National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I men's basketball during the 2008–09 season. Playing in the Pacific-10 Conference (Pac-10) and led by first-year head coach Craig Robinson, the Beavers finished the season with a 18–18 overall record and won the 2009 College Basketball Invitational. It was Oregon State's first-ever postseason tournament championship. Their 12-win improvement over the previous season was the third-highest turnaround in in 2008–09. In Pac-10 play, the Beavers finished in eighth place with a 7–11 record. They lost in the first round of the 2009 Pac-10 Tournament to Stanford, 62–54. ==Roster== ==References== Category:Oregon State Beavers men's basketball seasons Oregon State Category:College Basketball Invitational championship seasons Oregon State Oregon State Beavers Men's Basketball Team Oregon State Beavers Men's Basketball Team
